description.en: Main beach in new town. Mix of free and paid sections with services.

description.it: La spiaggia più grande con stabilimenti balneari attrezzati, lettini, ombrelloni e servizi completi.

description.en: Rent sunbeds and umbrellas. Restaurant service available.
description.de: Kleinerer, gemütlicher Strand direkt am historischen Zentrum mit authentischer Atmosphäre.

description.it: Spiaggia più piccola e caratteristica ai piedi del borgo antico, meno affollata e più autentica.

description.en: Public areas between the paid sections. Bring your own gear.

description.fr: Mer Ligurienne propre et claire, parfaite pour la baignade et le snorkeling. Drapeau bleu européen.

description.en: Smaller beach near the harbor. More rocky but atmospheric.

description.en: Clear water, gentle waves. Perfect for families.
